content:
Your problem is https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1966256. The workaround is to change the UNC path you are using somewhere in Thunderbird to be a mapped drive.

Please confirm.
creator: wsmwk

content:
韋恩·梅里 said
您的問題是 https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1966256。解決方法是將 Thunderbird 中某處使用的 UNC 路徑變更為映射磁碟機。請確認。

Thank you, Wayne.

Yes, that is indeed the issue. I appreciate your confirmation and the suggested workaround.

However, due to company policy and workflow requirements, we rely on opening .eml files directly from UNC paths and would prefer not to switch to mapped drives.

I hope this issue can be fully resolved in a future release so that Thunderbird continues to support UNC paths as in previous versions.

Thanks again for your help!
creator: chan.ronny818

content: A fix in the beta version is available for your testing at https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1966256#c47 If you are able to test, please post your results here.

content:
Thunderbird now as two versions: the extended support release that is intended for long-term stability with minor updates, and the monthly release that will have the lastest enhancements. The version numbers are different, the esr is a t128 and the monthlly is at 138.

These links may help: 

 https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/choosing-thunderbird-release-channel

https://blog.thunderbird.net/2025/03/thunderbird-release-channel-update/

If you're happy with the ESR, just stay with it. I hope you find the links useful david
creator: davidsk

content: Se mais alguém estiver com esse problema, consegui encontrar uma solução. O Thunderbird não lida muito bem com caminhos UNC, então resolvi mapear a pasta de rede do e-mail e, no arquivo de perfil, apontei para a letra da unidade mapeada.

content: in Account Settings > Copies & folders which is the destination folder for Drafts? In earlier TB versions one could use the add-on "FolderFlags" https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/folderflags/ to correct such an anomaly but it is not yet compatible with TB 138.

content: Hi.I should not have to install an add-on.Other computer has none and settings are all the same.Why is this doing this????
creator: redsoxfan53

content: I know that it should NOT happen, nevertheless it happens and I don't know WHY. Try the following (no guarantee!): return to your Account Settings > "faulty" account > Copies & Folders > Drafts & Templates, check ◉ Other and select "Drafts on myaccoutname" (see picture)
creator: Mapenzi

content: We cannot assist there. Your best bet is to contact your email provider. All thunderbird does is retain your last used password.
creator: davidsk

content: IMAP is a living account. The only way to stop is to either remove account or remove password so the signin gives regular 'incorrent password' message. If you want to keep the messages, but not the account, I suggest COPYing the messages to Local Folders and then close the account.
creator: davidsk

content: Went the Local Folder route. Thank you very much.
creator: daveatt

content: You are very welcome. :)
creator: davidsk

content:
In Tasto menu > Impostazioni account > NOME_ACCOUNT cosa c'è nella casella Indirizzo per le risposte?

Inoltre, Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content:
Buonasera, ho faticato a trovare le risposte perchè non sono esperto, ma eccole :

cosa c'è nella casella Indirizzo per le risposte? : Studio di Ingegneria Dr. Ing. Carlo Bruschini ma ho provato a cancellare e non cambia nulla : nella cartella posta inviata permane un doppio messaggio uno inviato da 'Studiobruschini info' ed uno da 'Studio di ingegneria Dr. Ing. Carlo Bruschini'

Thunderbird 128.10.1esr (64bit); Windows 11 Pro 23H2 build 22631.5335 (purtroppo); fornitore di linea dati : Fastweb  ; account : imap.gmail.com  ; nessun messaggio di errore; antivirus : Kasperskay  ;

Grazie CB
creator: carlo.bruschini

content:
Dato che usi Gmail con IMAP probabilmente hai sottoscritto la cartella Tutti i messaggi che contiene una copia della posta di tutte le altre cartelle. Di solito la sottrazione di questa cartella è sconsigliata proprio perché duplica la posta.

Qui trovi tutti i dettagli -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/thunderbird-gmail#w_sottoscrizione-delle-cartelle-e-sincronizzazione-dei-messaggi

Prova a verificare se il problema è questo.

content:
Thanks for your answer. I looked at the source and couldn't see anything I could recognize a text content, so maybe the only content was an image and therefore blocked.

The email is clearly spam. It purports to be from "Pay Pal", and yet the sender's address is from comcast.net. Aside from me, there are 98 other recipients, all with comcast.net addresses perhaps from the massive Comcast hack a couple of years ago.
creator: DonK

content: You could delete the user data by deleting the Thunderbird folder in .../AppData/Roaming, as this is unaffected by program uninstall/reinstall. A better method is to create a new profile, from Help/Troubleshooting Info, about:profiles, which leaves the previous profile untouched in case it has data you wish to retain.
creator: sfhowes

content:
Just to make sure that I understand … You cannot send a message from one account and you believe that deleting and re-installing everything will help?

Let’s focus on the problem. What happens when you try to send from that account?

The most common cause is simply that some settings are wrong, which is easy to fix.

content: Reinstalling rarely fixes anything, and sometimes causes problems. I suggest clicking help>troubleshoot mode and restart with addons disabled and see how that works. The fact that your menu bar is above the unified toolbar caused me to infer that you are using the usercontrol.css file with customizations.

content:
If hardware acceleration is enabled in Settings/General (bottom of tab) in normal mode, disable it, restart TB, and see if the emails appear.

http://kb.mozillazine.org/Safe_Mode

content:
Hi sfhowes. Thank you so much for your advice. Harware acceleration was on so I disabled it and rebooted TB. Regretably it has not solved the problem.

Thank you so much for trying to help me. Im very grateful.

At least I am able to read my emails in safe mode but I feel a bit lost.

Regards

JJ
creator: jj.7

content: As you can see from the mozillazine article, there are several factors with safe mode. Try launching in safe mode, and at the prompt, 'reset toolbars & controls' & 'make changes & restart'. Make sure the default them is in use (Tools/Add-ons & Themes).
